org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Class AeStateChangeDetail

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeStateChangeDetail
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeStateChangeDetail
public class AeStateChangeDetail
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeStateChangeDetail

Provides additional information regarding the object's state change. This is currently only used to convey the fault name during an object's entering into the faulted state. In all other cases, we're simply using the NONE static field.

Field Summary
private  java.lang.String mAdditionalInfo
          Additional info associated with the fault.
private  java.lang.String mFaultName
          The name of the fault
static IAeStateChangeDetail NONE
          constant used to report no additional information regarding the state change
 
Constructor Summary
AeStateChangeDetail(java.lang.String aFaultName)
          Creates a detail object with just the fault name
AeStateChangeDetail(java.lang.String aFaultName, java.lang.String aInfo)
          Creates a detail object with the fault name and additional info
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getAdditionalInfo()
          Return additional information regarding a state change.
 java.lang.String getFaultName()
          Returns non-null if the object's change was due to a fault
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
